archiefmat.titel: Ingekomen stukken en minuten van uitgaande stukken
archiefmat.titel_eng: Incoming documents and final drafts of outgoing documents
archiefmat.scope: Contains received correspondence, but also related resolutions taken by the governor, regarding various subjects: colonization by Germans in Albina, border with French Guyana, government plantations, etc.
archiefmat.notes:
The complete series up to 1921 consists of 12 packs and 1 folder.

The numbers of the inventory items may be changed (November 2008).
archiefmat.Aantekeningen: NB de nummering kan mogelijk nog wijzigen; het archief wordt op dit moment (november 2008) omgenummerd. Later nazien!
